incidents.name: Verify experienced an increase in HTTP 500 and 503 codes and latencies on the Verifications API.

incident_updates.body: Twilio Verify was degraded for 28 minutes between 21:50:49 and 22:18:16 UTC Pacific Time on 09/05/2025. During this period of time customers may have experienced an increase in HTTP 500 and 503 codes and latencies on the Verifications API. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Proxy API affected with elevated HTTP 500 errors

incident_updates.body: Twilio Proxy API was degraded for 15 minutes between 17:17 and 17:32 Pacific Time on 09/01/2025. During this period of time, customers may have experienced elevated HTTP 500 errors including Flex. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Errors for the Twilio Rest API Impacting Multiple Twilio Services

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple services. This incident has been resolved.

We will continue monitoring to ensure the Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple services do not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to confirm a full recovery and provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery with the Twilio Rest API issue impacting multiple Twilio services starting at approximately 5:16 AM UTC. Our engineering team has identified the problem, implemented a fix, and we are now seeing services recover. We will continue monitoring all services to ensure full recovery and will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate issues impacting the Programmable Messaging API, TaskRouter, Proxy and Programmable Video starting at approximately 5:16 AM UTC. During this period, about 0.1% of Programmable Messaging API requests (~2,500 requests) returned 5xx errors. TaskRouter is seeing approximately 80 errors (503) from Proxy and Video is reporting 106 requests with status 503. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating issues impacting the Programmable Messaging API, TaskRouter, Proxy and Programmable Video starting at approximately 5:16 AM UTC. During this period, about 0.1% of Programmable Messaging API requests (~2,500 requests) returned 5xx errors. TaskRouter is seeing approximately 80 errors (503) from Proxy and Video is reporting 106 requests with status 503. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue for Messaging, Proxy, TaskRouter, and Programmable Video. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Errors for the Twilio Rest API Impacting Multiple Twilio Services

incident_updates.body: All impacted Twilio Services have been resolved and Twilio REST API is operating normally at this time.

We will continue to monitor and ensure the Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple Twilio services does not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to confirm a full recovery and provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update tomorrow at 10:00 AM PT or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple Twilio services between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT. We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT:

-Flex Taskrouter: 5xx errors from TaskRouter APIs
-Flex Proxy: 5xx errors from Proxy APIs
-Flex Application Platform: To be determined
-Studio: Increased latency
-Programmable SMS: Increase in 5xx errors for API requests to send messages
-Programmable Video Recordings: 5xx errors
-Programmable Voice Calls: 5xx errors for Voice APIs
-Programmable Voice Recordings: increased errors when updating recording requests
-Programmable Voice Conferences: inability to add participants to conferences
-Verify: 5xx errors returned from the API

We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT:

-Flex Taskrouter: 5xx errors from TaskRouter APIs
-Flex Proxy: 5xx errors from Proxy APIs
-Flex Application Platform: To be determined
-Studio: Increased latency
-Programmable SMS: Increase in 5xx errors for API requests to send messages
-Programmable Video: Some 5XX errors affecting creation or deletion of video recordings
-Programmable Voice: 5xx errors for kube_namespace:rest-proxy-voice-apis 
-Programmable Voice Recordings: Increased errors when updating recording requests
-Verify: 5xx errors returned from the API

We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services: Flex Taskrouter, Flex Application Platform, Lookup, Flex Proxy, Programmable Messaging (SMS Only), Programmable Video, Programmable Voice, Verify, Studio between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT. We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur.  We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services: Flex Taskrouter, Flex Application Platform, Lookup, Flex Proxy, Programmable Messaging, Programmable Video, Programmable Voice, Verify, Studio between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT. We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur. We are monitoring partial recovery on the issue impacting Webhooks to customer systems in IE1. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are monitoring partial recovery on the issue impacting Webhooks to customer systems in IE1. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are monitoring partial recovery on the issue impacting Webhooks to customer systems in IE1. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate and have discovered that Conference, TwiML and Text-to-Speech products were affected by the dropped webhooks issue. We are continuing to monitor for any further issues. We will provide another update in 2 hours.

We are continuing to investigate and have discovered that Conference, TwiML and Text-to-Speech products were affected by the dropped webhooks issue. We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.
We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.
We are monitoring partial recovery on the issue impacting Webhooks to customer systems in IE1. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are monitoring partial recovery on the issue impacting Webhooks to customer systems in IE1. We will update in 1 hour or as sson as more information becomes available

We are investigating an issue Dropped webhooks to customer systems in ie1 in all products sending webhooks including voice, messaging, debugger and others. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue  Dropped webhooks to customer systems in ie1 in all products sending webhooks including voice, messaging, debugger and others. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to and from Multiple Networks in US for a Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays and failures to and from multiple networks in the US for a subset of short codes. This incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays and failures to and from multiple networks in the US for a subset of short codes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our engineers continue working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue related to SMS delivery delays and failures to and from multiple networks in the US for a subset of short codes. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We have identified that Messages from Multiple Network Subscribers in the US to a Subset of Short Codes are also impacted for this incident. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery Delays and failures to multiple networks in US for a subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hou or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incidents.name: AccSec API Errors Towards Vodafone UK

incident_updates.body: API Errors Towards Vodafone UK has been resolved and AccSec Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap and Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes are operating normally at this time.
We are monitoring partial recovery on the issue impacting API Errors Towards Vodafone UK in IE1. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing API Errors Towards Vodafone UK. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are experiencing API Errors Towards Vodafone UK. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failure to Romania Vodafone Via Registered Sender IDs

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery failures sending to messages to Vodafone Romania. This incident has been resolved.

We continue to observe successful SMS delivery to Romania Vodafone Via Registered Sender IDs.  We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing successful SMS delivery to Romania Vodafone Via Registered Sender IDs.  We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS Delivery Failure to Romania Vodafone Via Registered Sender IDs. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery failures sending to messages to Vodafone Romania. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Help Center Assistant API Outage

incident_updates.body: Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. This incident is now resolved

Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience issues with the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers, requests are failing across all application surfaces and customers are unable to interact with our Help Center Assistant:
- Customers with Free Support plans will be unable to contact support
- Customers with Paid Support will not be able to use the Help Center Assistant, but are unaffected as it relates to contacting support.
- Intelligent Discovery Assistant that is on the Voice and Messaging Insights in the Twilio Console is also impacted
We are currently working to deploy a fix and we expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue with the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers, requests are failing across all application surfaces and customers are unable to interact with our Help Center Assistant:
- Customers with Free Support plans will be unable to contact support
- Customers with Paid Support will not be able to use the Help Center Assistant, but are unaffected as it relates to contacting support.
- Intelligent Discovery Assistant that is on the Voice and Messaging Insights in the Twilio Console is also impacted
We are currently working to deploy a fix and we expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio's AI Assistant. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.
